options.label: Server URL
options.hint: WebSocket URL of the Troparcel collaboration server.

options.label: Room
options.hint: Collaboration room name. All participants must use the same room. Leave blank to use the project name.

options.label: User ID
options.hint: Your display name for attribution. Other collaborators will see this on your annotations.

options.label: Auto Sync
options.hint: Automatically sync annotations in the background. Disable to only sync via File menu.

options.label: Sync Mode
options.hint: How remote changes are handled. 'auto' applies changes as they arrive. 'review' accumulates changes and only applies them when you trigger Import from the File menu.

options.label: Sync Photo Adjustments
options.hint: Sync photo metadata (brightness, contrast, saturation, angle, mirror, negative) between collaborators.

options.label: Sync Lists
options.hint: Sync list membership between collaborators. Items will be added/removed from lists based on other users' changes.

options.label: Tropy API Port
options.hint: Port of Tropy's local HTTP API (2019 for latest, 2029 for stable).

options.label: Room Token
options.hint: Shared secret for room authentication. All participants must use the same token.

options.label: Startup Delay (ms)
options.hint: Milliseconds to wait after connecting before first sync. Allows Tropy's startup operations (FTS, migrations) to finish. Increase if you see SQLITE_BUSY errors on startup.

options.label: Local Change Debounce (ms)
options.hint: Milliseconds to wait after detecting a local DB change before pushing to the CRDT. Batches rapid edits.

options.label: Remote Change Debounce (ms)
options.hint: Milliseconds to wait after receiving a remote CRDT change before applying locally. Batches rapid concurrent edits.

options.label: Safety Net Interval (seconds)
options.hint: Periodic full sync interval in seconds, as a safety net in case the file watcher misses changes. Set to 0 to disable.

options.label: Write Delay (ms)
options.hint: Milliseconds to wait between API write operations. Gives the database breathing room. Increase if you see lock errors.

options.label: Max Backups
options.hint: Maximum number of backup snapshots to keep per room. Older backups are pruned automatically.

options.label: Max Note Size (bytes)
options.hint: Maximum size for notes and transcriptions from remote sources (default 1 MB). Larger values are rejected.

options.label: Max Metadata Size (bytes)
options.hint: Maximum size for individual metadata values from remote sources (default 64 KB). Larger values are rejected.

options.label: Tombstone Flood Threshold
options.hint: If more than this fraction (0-1) of an item's data is tombstoned in a single sync, a warning is logged. Protects against bulk deletion from a rogue node.

options.label: Debug Logging
options.hint: Enable verbose debug logging for troubleshooting sync issues. Check the Tropy developer console for output.
